meta.title: Co-Creation Ecosystem - FlorenceEGI
meta.description: Discover FlorenceEGI's co-creative ecosystem: Co-Create artworks, permanent Co-Creators and Trader Pro tools for professional trading.
meta.keywords: co-creation, co-creators, trader pro, ecosystem, blockchain art, EGI, professional trading

hero.title: Where Every Participant Becomes a Protagonist
hero.subtitle: Digital art and sustainable innovation, together
hero.description: In FlorenceEGI there are no simple buyers. Every participant becomes a co-creator, co-protagonist in the artwork's story.

cocreate.title: The Concept of Co-Creating
cocreate.subtitle: Actively participate in the public birth of an artwork

sharedCreation.title: The Act of Shared Creation
sharedCreation.content: Co-creating in FlorenceEGI means participating in the most magical moment of digital art: the first purchase. It's not simply a commercial transaction, but the founding act that transforms a private work into a public cultural asset.
sharedCreation.highlight: The first purchase is the act that makes the artwork "alive and public"

privateToPublic.title: From Private to Public
privateToPublic.content: Through minting and the first purchase, the work leaves the private dimension of the artist's studio to enter the public sphere of shared culture. The Co-creator doesn't just acquire an artwork, but becomes an integral part of its history.

cocreator.title: The Co-Creator Figure
cocreator.subtitle: A permanent bond with the artwork and guaranteed worldwide visibility

permanentBond.title: Permanent Bond
permanentBond.content: The Co-creator remains forever united with the EGI, together with the original Creator. This indissoluble bond guarantees perpetual recognition of their founding role.

globalVisibility.title: Worldwide Visibility
globalVisibility.content: Through registration and personalized profile, the Co-creator gains maximum visibility worldwide and global recognition of their contribution.

cocreator.cofounderMessage: The Co-creator is not just a buyer: they are the co-founder of the artwork's public existence

trader.title: Trader Pro: Dual Strategy
trader.subtitle: Professional tools for traders and revolutionary marketing for creators

egiPtSystem.title: The EGI PT System: Digital Emissaries
egiPtSystem.description: EGI PT (Print Token) are limited versions of the original EGI, designed for fast trading and viral spread of the artwork.

features.title: Maximum 5 EGI PT
features.description: For each EGI with physical asset, maximum 5 EGI PT are created, ensuring scarcity and value.

features.title: Unique Numbering
features.description: Each EGI PT is made unique by a serial number, while remaining identical to the original.

features.title: Digital Emissaries
features.description: EGI PTs are messengers of the physical EGI in the global digital world.

fees.title: Zero Creator Fee
fees.description: The Creator doesn't retain commissions on EGI PT, keeping the focus on free marketing.

fees.title: Zero Platform Fee
fees.description: FlorenceEGI doesn't retain commissions on EGI PT, maximizing trading volumes.

fees.title: EPP Only
fees.description: Only commission: 0.5% for environmental projects, ensuring minimum sustainable impact.
